Definition: Date of the year guiding interaction occurred on
Guided to bees (B), guided to animals other than bees (A)
Age class of guiding honeyguide: 4 = Adult, 3 = Adult with a few yearling feathers remaining, 1 = Juvenile in its first year, and unk = unknown
species of bee guided to (where known): apis = Apis mellifera
Whether or not the bees' nest was harvested and a reward left for honeyguides
Unique identifier for the bees' nest or animal guided to
Identifier for gpx. track from the relevant guiding interaction
Identifier for audio wav. track from the relevant guiding interaction
Start time (UTC+2) for honeyguide 'indication' calls (if relevant)
End time for guiding interaction when honey-hunter spots bees or animal and calls "woo" in the recording
Time from start of indication calls to when human calls woo
Latitude in decimal degrees of bee tree
Longitude in decimal degrees of bee tree
Time at start of guiding interaction
Time when indications calls begin (if relevant)
Time that tree is found
Distance in a straight line or 'as-the-crow-flies' meters between when then final phase or 'indication' calls started and where the bees were located (if found)
Distance in straight line or 'as-the-crow-flies' meters between start and end points of a guiding interaction
Distance in meters of the track recorded while following a honeyguide
Timestamp (UTC+2) of the first point of the gpx. track
Timestamp (UTC+2) of the last point of the gpx. track
Average moving speed of the human carrying the GPS when following the honeyguide
